Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: A quartet of friends was at the airport with time to spare so they could say goodbye to one of the crew who was homeward bound to Australia.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: They had zigzagged across the country by plane — highlights included stops in Florida, Nashville, and Lake Tahoe — after working together at a New York summer camp.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: More than 930,000 travelers will funnel through SFO from Thursday through Tuesday, according to SFO spokesperson Doug Yakel.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Doug Yakel is the spokesperson for SFO, providing official data and predictions about airport travel.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: This year’s prediction is 97% of what the airport handled five years ago, Yakel said by email.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Doug Yakel is the spokesperson for SFO, providing official data and predictions about airport travel.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: To make it on time, holiday travelers should arrive at the airport two hours before domestic flights and three hours before international ones, Yakel said.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Doug Yakel is the spokesperson for SFO, providing official data and predictions about airport travel.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Yakel said SFO has not been advised of staffing woes for Thursday, which was expected to be the busiest day of travel at the airport.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Doug Yakel is the spokesperson for SFO, providing official data and predictions about airport travel.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “I have TSA Pre, so that should make it a little easier,” said Bay Area resident Katelin Tharp, who on Thursday was booted from an overbooked flight to Boston, where she’s beginning her fifth year at Northeastern University.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Katelin Tharp is a Bay Area resident and traveler directly affected by the airport's conditions, sharing her personal experience.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “So, I’ll be hanging out for a little bit.”
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Katelin Tharp is a Bay Area resident and traveler directly affected by the airport's conditions, sharing her personal experience.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “We’re sad since we just said goodbye to our one friend, and we don’t know if we’re ever going to see her again,” Ellie Mitchell, of the United Kingdom, told The Standard.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Ellie Mitchell is part of the group of friends traveling together, providing a personal perspective on their experience at the airport.

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: United Airlines advised passengers to leave even more time.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: United Airlines is a major airline providing travel advisories to its passengers.

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: A United Airlines spokesperson said the three-hour warning was issued by mistake: somehow the company posted a years-old notice to the Chicago-bound boarding pass.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: United Airlines is a major airline providing travel advisories to its passengers.

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: The spokesperson shared a corrected advisory that suggested passengers “arrive early to avoid delays,” and to get a head start by checking bags from home and leaving luggage in the bag drop shortcut area at the airport.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: United Airlines is a major airline providing travel advisories to its passengers.

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: Parking at airport garages will be in short supply this weekend, so travelers who want to leave cars at SFO should reserve spaces online as soon as possible, Yakel said.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: SFO is the airport providing official information about parking availability and travel tips.

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: One lot for international flights had already sold out for the weekend by Thursday; the other was almost fully reserved.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: SFO is the airport providing official information about parking availability and travel tips.

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: More spaces appear to be up for grabs in the domestic and long-term garages.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: SFO is the airport providing official information about parking availability and travel tips.

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: There are no major projects on the freeways near SFO, so with a bit of luck, drivers headed to the airport shouldn’t face major delays, Caltrans officials said.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: Caltrans is the state agency responsible for transportation infrastructure, providing updates on freeway conditions near SFO.
